sms_refitScreen.sModAutofitDesc:
Attempts to copy S-mods installed from the selected goal variant.

Prioritizes enhancing built-ins, followed by S-modding modular hullmods. This step is performed prior to any other autofit step.

If S-mods are installed, the autofit cannot be undone.

sms_recentBattles.title: Defeated %s on %s in %s
sms_recentBattles.replayDesc: You can replay this battle in a no-stakes simulation environment at any time. Your ships will start with hull and armor fully repaired regardless of their current status in your fleet.
sms_recentBattles.pinDesc: Only the %s most recent unpinned battles are available for replay. Pin this battle to make it permanently available.
sms_recentBattles.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this battle entry?
sms_recentBattles.soloReplayDesc: Battle only the selected ship in a simulation environment.

sms_masteryPanel.mustBeDockedHullmods: Must be docked at a market to build in hullmods.
sms_masteryPanel.mustBeDockedMasteries: Must be docked at a market to change active masteries
sms_masteryPanel.buildInOverMaxWarning: Warning: building in additional S-mods will incur a DP penalty
sms_masteryPanel.cantOpenPanel: Error initializing mastery panel -- close all interfaces and retry.
sms_masteryPanel.createConstructConfirmTextSingular: Spend %1$s to build %2$s knowledge construct for this ship hull that has a value of %3$s?
sms_masteryPanel.createConstructConfirmTextPlural: Spend %1$s to build %2$s knowledge constructs for this ship hull that have a value of %3$s?
sms_masteryPanel.rerollMasteryConfirmText:
This will generate a fresh set of mastery effects for all levels where the effect is randomized, affecting both player and NPC fleets. Only mastery levels for which the player does not have an effect active will be regenerated. 

The mastery levels containing randomized effects for this hull are: 
-  %1$s.

Of those, the following levels are inactive and will be regenerated:
-  %2$s.

Costs %3$s MP and %4$s SP. You have %5$s SP.
sms_masteryPanel.rerollMasteryNotApplicableText:
This will generate a fresh set of mastery= effects for all levels where the effect is randomized, affecting both player and NPC fleets. Only mastery levels for which the player does not have an effect active will be regenerated. 

The mastery levels containing randomized effects for this hull are: 
-  %1$s. 

Of those, all are currently active and ineligible for regeneration.
sms_masteryPanel.enhanceMasteryConfirmText:
This will increase the effectiveness of all mastery bonuses by %1$s.

Costs %2$s MP and %3$s SP. You have %4$s SP.
sms_masteryPanel.enhanceMasteryConfirmText2:
This will allow the first built-in logistics hullmod per ship to no longer use an S-mod slot.

Costs %1$s MP and %2$s SP. You have %3$s SP.
sms_masteryPanel.enhanceMasteryConfirmTextNoSP:
This will increase the effectiveness of all mastery bonuses by %1$s.

Costs %2$s MP.
sms_masteryPanel.enhanceMasteryConfirmText2NoSP:
This will allow the first built-in logistics hullmod per ship to no longer use an S-mod slot.

Costs %1$s MP.

sms_descriptions.SModCreditsCost: Increases the credits cost of building in hullmods by %1$s.
sms_descriptions.SModCreditsCostNeg: Reduces the credits cost of building in hullmods by %1$s.
sms_descriptions.SModMPCost: Increases the mastery point cost of building in hullmods by %1$s, down to a minimum of %2$s.
sms_descriptions.SModMPCostNeg: Reduces the mastery point cost of building in hullmods by %1$s.
sms_descriptions.RestorationCost: Increases the cost of restoring damaged ships by %1$s.
sms_descriptions.RestorationCostNeg: Reduces the cost of restoring damaged ships by %1$s.
sms_descriptions.SModRemoval: Grants the ability to clear S-mods from ships.
sms_descriptions.SModRemovalPost: All S-mods are removed. Costs nothing and refunds nothing.
sms_descriptions.SModRemovalPostWithRefund: All S-mods are removed. Costs nothing and refunds %1$s of spent credits and mastery points, rounded down.
sms_descriptions.SModsOverCapacitySingle: Grants the ability to bypass the standard S-mod limit, enabling installation of an additional %1$s S-mod.
sms_descriptions.SModsOverCapacityPlural: Grants the ability to bypass the standard S-mod limit, enabling installation of an additional %1$s S-mods.
sms_descriptions.SModsOverCapacityPost: DP is increased by %1$s for each installed S-mod past the normal limit, rounded up. This penalty only applies to S-mods installed by the player.
sms_descriptions.ScaleOtherMasteries: Increases the effectiveness of all mastery bonuses by %1$s.
sms_descriptions.ScaleOtherMasteriesNeg: Reduces the effectiveness of all mastery bonuses by %1$s.
sms_descriptions.ScaleOtherMasteriesPost: Doesn't affect itself. Doesn't affect mastery bonuses that aren't scalable. May not affect some flat boosts as integer bonuses are rounded down.
sms_descriptions.FluxByShieldUpkeep: Increases flux dissipation by %1$s and flux capacity by %2$s of shield upkeep cost.
sms_descriptions.FluxByShieldUpkeepNeg: Reduces flux dissipation by %1$s and flux capacity by %2$s of shield upkeep cost.
sms_descriptions.FluxByShieldUpkeepPost: No effect if the ship has no shields.
sms_descriptions.RangeIfNoBonuses: Increases base ballistic and energy weapon ranges by %1$s if they aren't affected by any other bonuses.
sms_descriptions.RangeIfNoBonusesNeg: Reduces base ballistic and energy weapon ranges by %1$s if they aren't affected by any other bonuses.
sms_descriptions.RangeIfNoBonusesPost: Only counts base range bonuses. Bonuses granted by Ballistic Mastery and Gunnery Implants are exempt. Conditional bonuses such as those occurring past a threshold do not negate this effect.
sms_descriptions.MaxOPForHull: Increases ordnance points by %1$s. Each %2$s of OP used past the base limit reduces hull integrity by %3$s.
sms_descriptions.MaxOPForHullPost: Hull reduction applied by this effect has a floor of %1$s and a cap of %2$s.
sms_descriptions.DPIfOnlyShip: If this is the only %1$s-class ship in your fleet, its DP cost is increased by %2$s.
sms_descriptions.DPIfOnlyShipNeg: If this is the only %1$s-class ship in your fleet, its DP cost is reduced by %2$s.
sms_descriptions.PeakCRMultipleShips: Increases peak combat readiness duration by %1$s for each additional %2$s-class ship in your fleet.
sms_descriptions.PeakCRMultipleShipsNeg: Decreases peak combat readiness duration by %1$s for each additional %2$s-class ship in your fleet.
sms_descriptions.PeakCRMultipleShipsPost: Effect stacks up to %1$s times and has a hard cap of %2$s increase to peak CR.
sms_descriptions.ShieldDeflection: Shield deflects all incoming projectiles for %1$s seconds when activated. Decreases shield unfolding rate by %2$s.
sms_descriptions.ShieldDeflectionPost: Shields take %1$s damage from deflected projectiles.
sms_descriptions.HighFrequencyMotes: Unlocks the %1$s, which upgrades the ship system's motes to deal additional energy damage that arcs through shields.
sms_descriptions.HighFrequencyMotesPost: Reduces the range to which motes can be launched by %1$s and reduces the maximum number of motes that can be simultaneously active by %2$s.
sms_descriptions.PhaseCloakResidue: The time flow bonus gained from phasing remains active after unphasing, decaying over the course of %1$s seconds.
sms_descriptions.PhaseCloakResiduePost: Damage taken is reduced by up to %1$s depending on local time flow. Cloak activation cost is multiplied by a factor of %2$s and cloak cooldown time is multiplied by a factor of %3$s. Negates the cooldown reduction of experimental phase coils.
sms_descriptions.EnergyMineConversion: Modifies the %1$s ship system, exchanging the standard high-explosive mines for lower yield mines with an energy and EMP payload.
sms_descriptions.EnergyMineConversionPost: Mine explosion damage is converted to energy type and reduced by %1$s. Upon exploding, mines spawn up to %2$s EMP arcs that deal %3$s energy damage and %4$s EMP damage each, with a chance to pierce shields depending on the target's hard flux level.
sms_descriptions.RecallDeviceRegeneration: Activating %1$s also boosts fighter replacement rate by %2$s and has a %3$s chance of replenishing each destroyed fighter.
sms_descriptions.RecallDeviceDestruction: Activating %1$s also spontaneously dematerializes all enemy fighters within %2$s su.
sms_descriptions.RecallDeviceDestructionPost: Effect radius is modified by mastery effect strength and not by ship system range bonuses.
sms_descriptions.BallisticFireRateHullLevel: Increases ballistic weapons' fire rate and projectile speed by up to %1$s and decreases ballistic weapons' flux cost by up to %2$s, depending on amount of hull damage the ship has taken.
sms_descriptions.BallisticFireRateHullLevelPost: Maximum effect level is reached when the ship's hull integrity is below %1$s of maximum.
sms_descriptions.BallisticFireRateFluxLevel: Increases ballistic weapons' fire rate and projectile speed by up to %1$s and decreases ballistic weapons' flux cost by up to %2$s, depending on the ship's flux level.
sms_descriptions.BallisticFireRateFluxLevelPost: Maximum effect level is reached when the ship's flux level reaches %1$s of maximum.
sms_descriptions.SpeedHullLevel: Increases maximum speed by up to %1$s depending on amount of hull damage the ship has taken.
sms_descriptions.SpeedHullLevelPost: Maximum effect level is reached when the ship's hull integrity is below %1$s of maximum.
sms_descriptions.AAFRangeDamage: %1$s also increases ballistic weapons' damage and range by %2$s of their base values while active.
sms_descriptions.AAFRangeDamagePost: The upgraded ship system costs %1$s flux/s to maintain.
sms_descriptions.ManeuveringJetsMobility: Activating %1$s grants an additional mobility boost, vastly improving acceleration and turn acceleration.
sms_descriptions.ManeuveringJetsMobilityPost: Multiples forward and turning acceleration power by a factor of %1$s. Multiplies deceleration power by a factor of %2$s.
sms_descriptions.SystemRegenOnKill: Destroying %1$s-sized ships or larger in combat recharges the ship system:
sms_descriptions.SystemRegenOnKillPost: If the ship's system uses charges, replenishes ammo count as if %1$s seconds had passed.
sms_descriptions.SystemRegenOnKillPost2: Otherwise, as long as the ship system isn't active, its cooldown time is reduced by the same amount.
sms_descriptions.SystemRegenOnKillPost3: Must deal the finishing blow for this effect to activate.
sms_descriptions.MissileRegenOnKill: Destroying a %1$s-sized ship or larger in combat reloads all missile weapons by %2$s of their base ammo values. Decreases all missile damage by %3$s.
sms_descriptions.MissileRegenOnKillPost: Fractional reload amounts are converted into chance to reload a single missile. No effect when destroying ships smaller than frigates. Must deal the finishing blow for this effect to activate.
sms_descriptions.HEFExplosion: While %1$s is active, projectiles fired by weapons on large energy-type mounts are imbued with a secondary explosive charge.
sms_descriptions.HEFExplosionPost: The explosion deals %1$s of the projectile's damage as additional high-explosive damage. If the projectile deals fragmentation damage, the explosion's damage is reduced by %2$s.
sms_descriptions.HEFExplosionPost2: No effect on beams or any other non-projectile weapons. No effect on energy weapons mounted on non-energy mounts.
sms_descriptions.ConvertedHangarBays: If %1$s is installed, the number of fighter bays it generates is increased by %2$s.
sms_descriptions.ConvertedHangarBaysPost: Negates the deployment points, CR per deployment, and supplies to recover penalties from %1$s. Does not negate the replacement rate or refit time penalties.
sms_descriptions.LidarArrayRange: Improves the passive range bonus of %1$s by an additional %2$s of base weapon range.
sms_descriptions.LidarArrayFlux: While %1$s is active, the flux cost of ballistic weapons is reduced by %2$s.
sms_descriptions.ShipSystemDR: While %1$s is active, all hull and armor damage taken is reduced by %2$s.
sms_descriptions.ShipSystemDRPost: The damage reduction also applies to any fighters that were launched by this ship.
sms_descriptions.BurnDriveMissileBoost: While %1$s is active, missiles gain a %2$s increase to top speed, acceleration, and durability.
sms_descriptions.PlasmaBurnEngineRepair: While %1$s is active, engine repair rate is multiplied by a factor of %2$s. Gain a brief maneuverability boost after %1$s ends.
sms_descriptions.PlasmaBurnEngineRepairPost: The maneuverability boost lasts for %1$s seconds and grants a decaying %2$s bonus to maximum turn rate and turn acceleration.
sms_descriptions.PlasmaBurnEnergyRoF: While %1$s is active, increases the rate of fire of energy weapons and decreases their flux cost by %2$s.
sms_descriptions.PlasmaBurnEnergyRoFPost: The rate of fire boost gradually decays over %1$s seconds after %2$s ends.
sms_descriptions.ZeroFluxResidue: The zero-flux boost to top speed and maximum turn rate no longer dissipates immediately after generating flux, instead wearing off over the course of %1$s seconds.
sms_descriptions.HitAngleDR: Increases hull and armor damage taken from beams and projectiles by up to %1$s depending on the angle of attack.
sms_descriptions.HitAngleDRNeg: Decreases hull and armor damage taken from beams and projectiles by up to %1$s depending on the angle of attack.
sms_descriptions.HitAngleDRPost: Effect is negated when the attack angle is perpendicular to the struck plate and maximized when the attack angle is parallel to the struck plate.
sms_descriptions.TPCUpgrade: Upgrades the ship's %1$s, giving each shot a %2$s chance to deal %3$s additional damage.
sms_descriptions.TPCUpgradePost: Whenever this effect triggers, the weapon that fired the shot gains %1$s ammo.
sms_descriptions.TPCChaining: Upgrades the ship's %1$s, increasing damage and allowing projectiles to arc to nearby enemies on contact.
sms_descriptions.TPCChainingPost: Thermal pulse cannon damage is increased by %1$s. On contact, chains to up to %2$s enemy ships or missiles within %3$s su, dealing 50%% of the original projectile's damage.
sms_descriptions.TorpedoTracking: Increases ammo of all reaper and hammer weapons by %1$s. All reaper and hammer torpedoes gain very poor tracking and %2$s hull integrity, while losing %3$s maximum speed.
sms_descriptions.TorpedoTrackingPost: Tracking rate is limited to %1$s degrees/second. The torpedoes cannot decelerate.
sms_descriptions.FMRRegen: Whenever %1$s is activated, all missile weapons regenerate %2$s of their base ammo capacity.
sms_descriptions.FMRRegenPost: Fractional amounts are converted into chance to regenerate one missile. Reduces maximum ship system charges to %1$s.
sms_descriptions.BurnDriveImpulse: Manually deactivating %1$s will cause the ship to be launched forward with considerable force.
sms_descriptions.BurnDriveImpulsePost: Launch power is affected by mastery effect strength modifiers.
sms_descriptions.OrionDeviceDamage: Modifies the shockwave generated by %1$s to inflict heavy damage to enemies caught in the blast.
sms_descriptions.OrionDeviceDamagePost: The shockwave does %1$s %2$s damage in a %3$s degree arc centered on the orion device and has a range of %4$s su. Damage counts as missile damage and is affected by missile damage modifiers.
sms_descriptions.ArmorRepair: Damaged armor components are slowly repaired during battle.
sms_descriptions.ArmorRepairPost: Repairs either %1$s percent of missing armor or %2$s armor per second, whichever is less. Reduces minimum armor fraction for damage reduction calculation by %3$s.
sms_descriptions.NovaBurstDamage: Modifies the shockwave generated by %1$s to inflict heavy damage to enemies caught in the blast.
sms_descriptions.NovaBurstDamagePost: The shockwave does %1$s %2$s and EMP damage in a %3$s degree arc centered on the nova burst emitter and has a range of %4$s su.
sms_descriptions.HullThresholdDR: After taking substantial hull damage, gain %1$s hull and armor damage reduction for %2$s seconds.
sms_descriptions.HullThresholdDRPost: This effect triggers after losing each %1$s of maximum hull integrity and can trigger a maximum of %2$s time(s). Hull that is repaired during combat does not count to trigger this effect, nor does it increase the maximum activations.
sms_descriptions.FastSkimmer: Modifies the %1$s ship system, allowing it to be used and recharged faster while substantially reducing its range.
sms_descriptions.FastSkimmerPost: Reduces ship system chargedown duration by %1$s and range by %2$s, while increasing regeneration rate by %3$s and maximum charges by %4$s.
sms_descriptions.SkimmerDR: After activating %1$s, hull and armor damage taken is reduced by up to %2$s for %3$s seconds.
sms_descriptions.SkimmerDRPost: The damage reduction is at its maximum value immediately after the system is active and begins to decay immediately.
sms_descriptions.EfficiencyOverhaulBoost: If %1$s is installed, reduces maintenance cost and fuel usage by an additional %2$s.
sms_descriptions.ExpandedCargoBoost: If %1$s is installed, increases cargo capacity by an additional %2$s.
sms_descriptions.ExpandedFuelBoost: If %1$s is installed, increases fuel capacity by an additional %2$s.
sms_descriptions.ExpandedCrewBoost: If %1$s is installed, increases crew capacity by an additional %2$s.
sms_descriptions.DroneStrikeBoost: Increases the damage, speed, maneuverability, and hull integrity of drones launched by %1$s by %2$s, and negates the system's flux cost..
sms_descriptions.DroneStrikeRegen: Drones launched by %1$s have a %2$s chance of being quickly replaced. Destroying a frigate-sized or larger ship with a launched terminator drone boosts fighter replacement rate by %3$s.
sms_descriptions.DroneStrikeRegenPost: The replacement rate increase will only trigger if the drone deals the finishing blow.
sms_descriptions.BackArmorBoost: Increases armor rating toward the back of ships by up to %1$s.
sms_descriptions.BackArmorBoostPost: Armor plates above ships' center lines are not affected at all, whereas extremal armor plates gain the maximum effect. Doesn't affect minimum armor fraction for damage reduction calculation.
sms_descriptions.FlareLauncherWhileVenting: While venting, all flare-type weapons periodically fire at a rate of %1$s per second.
sms_descriptions.FlareLauncherWhileVentingPost: Effect only occurs during active venting and not while passively venting or while the ship is overloaded.
sms_descriptions.ShieldEfficiencyNearbyEnemies: Reduces shield damage taken by %1$s for every frigate-sized or larger enemy ship within %2$s su.
sms_descriptions.ShieldEfficiencyNearbyEnemiesPost: This effect stacks a maximum of %1$s times, for a maximum shield damage reduction of %2$s.
sms_descriptions.TimeFlowNearbyEnemies: Increases local time flow by %1$s for every frigate-sized or larger enemy ship within %2$s su.
sms_descriptions.TimeFlowNearbyEnemiesPost: This effect stacks a maximum of %1$s times, for a maximum time flow increase of %2$s.
sms_descriptions.DamageTakenNearbyEnemies: Reduces hull and armor damage taken by %1$s for every frigate-sized or larger enemy ship within %2$s su.
sms_descriptions.DamageTakenNearbyEnemiesPost: This effect stacks a maximum of %1$s times, for a maximum damage reduction of %2$s.
sms_descriptions.VentingSpeedBoost: While venting, maximum speed and maneuverability are increased by %1$s.
sms_descriptions.PlasmaJetsGrazeChance: While %1$s is active, incoming beams and projectiles have a chance to deal reduced damage by %2$s depending on the ship's movement speed.
sms_descriptions.PlasmaJetsGrazeChancePost: The chance of a graze is maximized at %1$s while at maximum adjusted speed. Damage reduction applies to hull, armor, and shields. Doesn't affect missiles.
sms_descriptions.HEFRangeRoF: %1$s also increases energy weapons' rate of fire and range, and reduces their flux generation, by %2$s while active.
sms_descriptions.HEFRangeRoFPost: The upgraded ship system costs %1$s flux/second to maintain.
sms_descriptions.RangeNotMoving: While at a standstill, ballistic and energy weapon ranges gradually increase up to a maximum of %1$s of their base values.
sms_descriptions.RangeNotMovingPost: Weapon range increases at a rate of %1$s/s while movement speed is at most %2$s su/s. The bonus decays at a rate of %3$s/s while movement speed exceeds %4$s su/s.
sms_descriptions.SafetyOverridesBoost: If %1$s is installed, increases maximum speed by an additional %2$s su/s and increases the threshold beyond which weapon ranges are penalized by %3$s su.
sms_descriptions.SafetyOverridesPPT: If %1$s is installed, multiplies peak performance time by a factor of %2$s.
sms_descriptions.BuiltInMissileRegen: All built in missile weapons that don't already regenerate ammo gain ammo regeneration at the rate of %1$s salvo per %2$s seconds.
sms_descriptions.ConvertedCargoBayNoPenalty: Removes the speed and hull integrity penalties imparted to fighters by %1$s and %2$s.
sms_descriptions.ExtraFighterPerWing: Adds a permanent reserve deployment to all fighter wings with at least %1$s fighters per wing.
sms_descriptions.ExtraFighterPerWingPost: This effect has lower priority than other sources of reserve deployment and will be suspended until they expire.
sms_descriptions.BurnDriveCooldown: Grants faster %1$s cooldown on manual deactivations: the cooldown time becomes proportional to the amount of time the system was active.
sms_descriptions.BurnDriveCooldownPost: This effect will not increase system cooldown rate beyond %1$s times normal rate.
sms_descriptions.LargeBallisticFragDamage: All large ballistic projectile weapons deal additional fragmentation damage per hit equal to %1$s of their base damage, up to a maximum of %2$s damage.
sms_descriptions.LargeBallisticFragDamagePost: Doesn't apply to weapons that themselves deal fragmentation damage.
sms_descriptions.PhasedCRDegradation: Reduces peak performance time decay and combat readiness degradation rate by %1$s while phased.
sms_descriptions.TemporalShellCRDegradation: While %1$s is active, reduces peak performance time decay and combat readiness degradation rate by %2$s.
sms_descriptions.ManeuveringJetsBoost: %1$s increases maximum speed by an additional %2$s su/s.
sms_descriptions.RangeNoNearbyEnemies: Boosts ballistic and energy weapon ranges by up to %1$s if no frigate-sized or larger enemy ships are nearby.
sms_descriptions.RangeNoNearbyEnemiesPost: While no enemies are within %1$s su, weapon ranges increase by %2$s/s up to the listed maximum. Otherwise, this bonus decays at the rate of %3$s/s.
sms_descriptions.EnergyProjectileRange: Increases the base range of all projectile energy weapons by %1$s su.
sms_descriptions.RandomBeamIntensity: Increases all beam weapon ranges by a flat %1$s su. Periodically increases all beam weapon damage by %2$s for %3$s seconds.
sms_descriptions.RandomBeamIntensityPost: As long as at least one beam weapon is firing, this effect has a %1$s chance to trigger per second.
sms_descriptions.MissileAutoforgeExtraCharge: Removes the flux cost from %1$s. It can be used an additional time per combat.
sms_descriptions.DEMBoost: Allows DEM weapons to regenerate ammo and grants additional bonuses to DEM weapons mounted on large slots.
sms_descriptions.DEMBoostPost: DEM weapons mounted on small/medium/large weapon slots gain ammo regeneration at the rate of 1 salvo per %1$s/%2$s/%3$s seconds. All missiles fired from DEM weapons on large slots gain %4$s hull integrity and %5$s maximum speed.
sms_descriptions.TargetingFeedBoost: While %1$s is active, all fighters gain %2$s maximum speed and an additional %3$s damage against other fighters. %1$s no longer generates flux.
sms_descriptions.RegroupReplacement: While fighters are ordered to regroup, replacement rate increases %1$s more quickly and decreases %2$s more slowly.
sms_descriptions.DamageChargesDamperField: Taking shield, armor, or hull damage charges %1$s. If %1$s is already at maximum charges, taking damage boosts the potency of its next activation.
sms_descriptions.DamageChargesDamperFieldPost: Each projectile or missile that lands increases ship system charge by a minimum of %1$s to a maximum of %2$s, depending on the damage of the hit. Charge is not gained from beam damage.
sms_descriptions.DamageChargesDamperFieldPost2: At max charges, each missile or projectile that lands increases the damage reduction of the next activation by %1$s to %2$s, depending on damage. This additional damage reduction stacks multiplicatively and is capped at %3$s.
sms_descriptions.DamperFieldFighters: While %1$s is active, all launched fighters inherit the carrier's damage reduction multiplier. %1$s prevents hull integrity of both fighters and carrier from dropping below %2$s.
sms_descriptions.ExtraMiningDrones: Adds an additional %1$s drones to the built-in mining drone bay.
sms_descriptions.ExtraMiningDronesPost: The additional drones are permanent reserve deployments and do not count towards fighter replacement rate degradation.
sms_descriptions.LimitedArmorRegen: Whenever an armor plate is fully depleted, it rapidly regains %1$s of its maximum integrity.
sms_descriptions.LimitedArmorRegenPost: This effect is limited to one activation per armor plate per combat.
sms_descriptions.FMRNoFlux: %1$s no longer generates flux when activated.
sms_descriptions.HammerLingeringDamage: Increases ammo capacity of all hammer-type missile weapons by %1$s. All hammer torpedoes gain additional armor-stripping capabilities:
sms_descriptions.HammerLingeringDamagePost: Hammer torpedoes deal up to %1$s of their damage as additional damage to all armor plates within a %2$s su radius over the course of %3$s seconds. Armor plates farther away from the blast's center take less damage. This damage is not reduced by armor.
sms_descriptions.FlareRegen: Allows %1$s to regenerate charges at the rate of 1 charge per %2$s seconds.
sms_descriptions.FlareRegenPost: Regeneration rate is also modified by the ship's charge regeneration rate multiplier.
sms_descriptions.FMRFastReplacement: Activating %1$s also has a %2$s chance of rapidly replacing a random destroyed fighter.
sms_descriptions.PilumSalamanderBoost: All %1$s and %2$s missiles gain %3$s durability and deal an additional %4$s energy and %5$s EMP damage.
sms_descriptions.FasterActiveFlares: Greatly reduces the arming time of active flares and increases their maneuverability and durability by %1$s.
sms_descriptions.BDeckExtraCharges: Expands the ship's %1$s, increasing its number of activations by %2$s.
sms_descriptions.BDeckExtraChargesPost: There is a minimum of a %1$s second delay between activations.
sms_descriptions.HEFMissileBoost: While %1$s is active, missiles gain an additional %2$s to damage, top speed, tracking, and durability.
sms_descriptions.HEFMissileBoostPost: The upgraded ship system costs %1$s flux/second to maintain.
sms_descriptions.ReserveDeploymentBoost: Gain up to an additional %1$s reserve deployments whenever %2$s is activated. During this time, fighter refit time is decreased by %3$s.
sms_descriptions.ReserveDeploymentBoostPost: These deployments are neither pre-fabricated nor launched concurrently with standard reserve fighters, instead replacing them as they are destroyed or reclaimed
sms_descriptions.FighterCountDR: For each fighter launched by and within %1$s su of this ship, damage taken is reduced by %2$s.
sms_descriptions.FighterCountDRPost: This effect stacks up to %1$s times, for a maximum damage reduction of %2$s.
sms_descriptions.QuantumDisruptorDuration: Increases the overload duration of %1$s by %2$s and reduces its cooldown by %3$s.
sms_descriptions.PhasedArmorRepair: Damaged armor components are slowly repaired while phased.
sms_descriptions.PhasedArmorRepairPost: While phased, repairs either %1$s percent of missing armor or %2$s armor per second, whichever is less. Increases phase cloak upkeep by %3$s.
sms_descriptions.MissileAutoloaderCapacity: If %1$s is installed, increases its capacity by %2$s.
sms_descriptions.CanisterFlakWhileVenting: While venting, all %1$s launchers automatically fire at a rate of %2$s per second.
sms_descriptions.SkimmerEMP: Whenever %1$s is activated, strikes up to %2$s enemy ships within %3$s su with an EMP arc dealing %4$s energy damage and %5$s EMP damage.
sms_descriptions.SkimmerEMPPost: This effect's range is modified by the ship's system range bonus.
sms_descriptions.ShieldEfficiencyHardFlux: Decreases shield damage taken by up to %1$s as the ship's hard flux level increases.
sms_descriptions.ShieldEfficiencyHardFluxPost: Requires %1$s hard flux to activate. Maximum effect reached at %2$s hard flux.
sms_descriptions.ConvertedHangarNoPenalty: Negates the replacement rate, rearm time, deployment point cost, and maintenance penalties of %1$s.
sms_descriptions.MinimumReplacementRate: As long as combat readiness remains above %1$s, fighter replacement rate will never drop below %2$s.
sms_descriptions.MinimumReplacementRatePost: The base minimum replacement rate is %1$s.
sms_descriptions.VentSpeedFluxLevel: Allows the ship to vent faster at higher flux levels: vent speed is reduced by %1$s at zero flux and increased by %2$s at maximum flux.
sms_descriptions.EntropyAmplifierChaining: %1$s chains its effect to %2$s additional frigate-sized or larger ships within %3$s su of the initial target.
sms_descriptions.EntropyAmplifierChainingPost: The chaining range is affected by ship system range bonuses.
sms_descriptions.EntropyAmplifierMobility: %1$s also reduces the mobility of the affected ship by %2$s.
sms_descriptions.PlasmaJetsDissipation: While %1$s is active, flux dissipation is multiplied by a factor of %2$s and grants an additional %3$s to hard flux dissipation while shields are active.
sms_descriptions.DamperFieldDissipation: While %1$s is active, flux dissipation is multiplied by a factor of %2$s.
sms_descriptions.MakeshiftShieldBoost: If %1$s is installed, extends shield arc by %2$s, reduces shield damage taken by %3$s, and negates the hullmod's speed penalty.
sms_descriptions.DecoyFlareBoost: Extends the lifetime and durability of flares launched by %1$s by %2$s.
sms_descriptions.MinimumCR: Combat readiness will never fall below %1$s during combat. Grants immunity to most malfunctions as long as combat readiness is above 0%%.
sms_descriptions.MinimumCRPost: Will not increase combat readiness if deployed below the threshold. Malfunction immunity is negated if the ship's safeties are overridden.
sms_descriptions.PhaseTeleporterTimeFlow: After activating %1$s, time flow is increased by %2$s, decaying over %3$s seconds.
sms_descriptions.PhaseTeleporterTimeFlowPost: Destroying an enemy frigate/destroyer/cruiser/capital ship while this effect is active adds an additional %1$s/%2$s/%3$s/%4$s seconds to peak performance time.
sms_descriptions.HEFShieldEfficiency: While %1$s is active, shield damage taken is reduced by %2$s.
sms_descriptions.ECMPackageBoost: If %1$s is installed, improves its effect by %2$s.
sms_descriptions.NavRelayBoost: If %1$s is installed, improves its effect by %2$s.
sms_descriptions.OperationsCenterBoost: If %1$s is installed on the flagship, improves its effect by %2$s.
sms_descriptions.ReactiveFortressShield: Whenever %1$s blocks a projectile, there is a %2$s chance that a bolt dealing %3$s energy damage and %4$s EMP damage will strike a nearby enemy ship.
sms_descriptions.ReactiveFortressShieldPost: The system will target the nearest ship within %1$s su and within a %2$s degree arc of the hit angle. The range is boosted by ship system range modifiers.
sms_descriptions.EMPEmitterFluxBoost: Whenever %1$s strikes a frigate-sized or larger ship, gain %2$s flux dissipation and dissipate an additional %3$s of hard flux while shields are up.
sms_descriptions.EMPEmitterFluxBoostPost: This effect stacks up to %1$s times, for a maximum dissipation bonus of %2$s, and decays at the rate of %3$s per second.
sms_descriptions.EMPEmitterEnergyDamage: Each bolt from %1$s deals an additional %2$s energy damage to fighters and ships.
sms_descriptions.EMPEmitterFragDamage: Each bolt from %1$s deals an additional %2$s fragmentation damage to fighters and ships.
sms_descriptions.DriveFieldStabilizerBoost: If %1$s is installed, increases the fleet's burn bonus by an additional %2$s.
sms_descriptions.GroundSupportBoost: If %1$s or %2$s is installed, increases the fleet's ground support bonus by an additional %3$s.
sms_descriptions.MaxAutomatedCR: The %1$s skill always grants an additional %2$s maximum combat readiness regardless of the fleet's automated ship points.
sms_descriptions.ApplyOfficerSkill: Grants the non-elite effect of %1$s to ships not captained by an officer already possessing that skill.
sms_descriptions.ShieldHullmodPackage: If 3 of the following hullmods are installed: %1$s, %2$s, %3$s, and %4$s, negates shield upkeep entirely and reduces shield damage taken by %5$s.
sms_descriptions.ArmorHullmodPackage: If %1$s and %2$s are installed, increases armor by an additional %3$s.
sms_descriptions.ArmorHullmodPackagePost: Effect stacks multiplicatively on top of other armor modifiers.
sms_descriptions.HullHullmodPackage: If %1$s and %2$s are installed, reduces hull and armor damage taken by %3$s.
sms_descriptions.EngineHullmodPackage: If %1$s, %2$s, and %3$s are installed, negates the range and fighter replacement time penalties of %4$s.
sms_descriptions.FighterHullmodPackage: If %1$s and %2$s are installed, reduces fighter replacement time by %3$s.
sms_descriptions.FluxHullmodPackage: If %1$s, %2$s, and %3$s are installed, increases flux capacity and flux dissipation by an additional %4$s.
sms_descriptions.BuiltInHSA: If %1$s is built in, increases the range of all beam weapons by an additional %2$s su.
sms_descriptions.AmmoHullmodPackage: If %1$s and %2$s are installed, increases ammo of all weapons by an additional %3$s, stacking multiplicatively on top of other ammo bonuses.
sms_descriptions.BuiltInNeuralIntegrator: If %1$s is built in, negates its deployment point cost penalty.
sms_descriptions.EmptyMountsReduceFlux: Each small/medium/large weapon mount left empty reduces the flux cost of all weapons by %1$s/%2$s/%3$s.
sms_descriptions.EmptyMountsReduceFluxPost: This effect has a hard cap of %1$s total weapon flux reduction.

sms_hullmods.rearrangementEffect1: - Time flow multiplied by a factor of %1$s.

sms_graveyard.intelPara1: A recent battle has caused the loss of one or more ships in your fleet. However, reports indicate that wrecks of the following ships are in recoverable condition:
sms_graveyard.intelPara2: Should the wrecks not be recovered within %1$s days, their conditions will deteriorate irreversibly, and they will be lost forever.
sms_graveyard.intelPara2Single: Should the wrecks not be recovered within %1$s day, their conditions will deteriorate irreversibly, and they will be lost forever.
sms_graveyard.intelDespawnWarning: Warning: deleting this log entry will immediately despawn the derelicts listed here.
sms_graveyard.insuranceListShips1: "By signing the insurance contracts and collecting their full-value claims, you forfeited your ownership of these ships. Naturally, I've come to collect them, as they are presently property of FeBSure. I hope you understand."
sms_graveyard.insuranceListShips2: The bounty hunter lets out a tired sigh. "Let's do this the easy way, yeah? I'd hate to have to reduce your fleet to space debris."
sms_graveyard.insuranceForfeitConfirm: Are you sure? The listed ships will be permanently lost.
sms_graveyard.insuranceForfeitConfirm2: Are you sure? The listed ships will be permanently lost, and you will have to pay an additional %1$s.
sms_graveyard.insuranceDiscrepancy1Plural: "... Now hold on, that won't do. The manifest doesn't match your fleet composition. There are %1$s ships on this list that are no longer in your fleet, and they *were* in your fleet very recently."
sms_graveyard.insuranceDiscrepancy1Single: "... Now hold on, that won't do. The manifest doesn't match your fleet composition. There is %1$s ship on this list that is no longer in your fleet, and it *was* in your fleet very recently."
sms_graveyard.insuranceDiscrepancy2: You hear a faint scoff. "You thought you could get away with that? No, you'll have to pay back however much the insurance claims on those mysteriously-disappeared ships awarded, in addition to forfeiting the claimed ships still in your fleet."

sms_misc.failedToGenerateMasteries: Failed to generate mastery effects! Check stack trace for details
sms_misc.doesntAffectModules: This effect doesn't apply to modules.
sms_misc.effectCantBeDeactivatedWarning: Warning: effect can't be deactivated once active
sms_misc.bestOfTheBestDesc: Increases the effectiveness of all ship mastery bonuses by %1$s
sms_misc.bestOfTheBestScope: all capital ships with officers, including flagship
sms_misc.bestOfTheBestDesc2: +%1$s maximum combat readiness, +%2$s hull integrity*, and +%3$s flux capacity*
sms_misc.bestOfTheBestDesc3: *Hull integrity and flux capacity bonuses are applied after other modifiers, including from additional flux capacitors.
sms_misc.excessOPWarning: Warning: capacitors, vents, and/or hullmods have been removed due to changes causing an OP overflow
sms_misc.cyberneticAugmentationDesc: +%1$s ordnance points (%2$s plus an additional %3$s for every %4$s mastered* ship types, excluding civilian ship types, up to a maximum of %5$s).
sms_misc.cyberneticAugmentationDesc2: *The base maximum number of elite skills per officer is %1$s.
sms_misc.cyberneticAugmentationDesc3Singular: *Master a ship type by reaching its maximum mastery level. For the purposes of this bonus, ships that are skins of the same base hull do not count as different ship types. You have mastered %1$s non-civilian ship type.
sms_misc.cyberneticAugmentationDesc3: *Master a ship type by reaching its maximum mastery level. For the purposes of this bonus, ships that are skins of the same base hull do not count as different ship types. You have mastered %1$s non-civilian ship types.
